Question: Griswold depicted this person as a depraved, drunk, drug-addled madman and included this person's letters as evidence.
Hints: Returning to Baltimore, this person secretly married Virginia, his cousin, on September 22, 1835.
After his brother's death, this person began more earnest attempts to start his career as a writer.
This person had an influence on cryptography beyond increasing public interest in his lifetime.
